Questions.Question: Who is the iconic character in the cartoon 'Tom and Jerry'?
Questions.Explanation: Tom is the mischievous cat and one of the main characters in the 'Tom and Jerry' cartoon series.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the iconic character in 'Scooby-Doo'?
Questions.Explanation: Scooby-Doo is the lovable Great Dane and the main character in the 'Scooby-Doo' cartoon series.

Questions.Question: Which character is the iconic friend of Winnie the Pooh?
Questions.Explanation: Piglet is the timid and kind-hearted pig who is a close friend of Winnie the Pooh.

Questions.Question: Who is the iconic character in the cartoon 'The Flintstones'?
Questions.Explanation: Fred Flintstone is the bumbling but lovable caveman and the main character in 'The Flintstones' cartoon series.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the iconic character in 'The Simpsons'?
Questions.Explanation: Homer Simpson is the dim-witted but well-meaning father and the main character in 'The Simpsons' cartoon series.

Questions.Question: Which character is the iconic friend of Mickey Mouse?
Questions.Explanation: Donald Duck is the hot-tempered but loyal friend of Mickey Mouse in various Disney cartoons.

Questions.Question: Who is the iconic character in the cartoon 'Looney Tunes'?
Questions.Explanation: Bugs Bunny is the clever and mischievous rabbit and the main character in 'Looney Tunes' cartoons.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the iconic character in 'The Powerpuff Girls'?
Questions.Explanation: Blossom is the intelligent and confident leader of the Powerpuff Girls in the animated series.

Questions.Question: Which character is the iconic friend of SpongeBob SquarePants?
Questions.Explanation: Patrick Star is the dim-witted but well-meaning best friend of SpongeBob SquarePants in the cartoon series.

Questions.Question: Who is the iconic character in the cartoon 'The Jetsons'?
Questions.Explanation: George Jetson is the bumbling but well-meaning father and the main character in 'The Jetsons' cartoon series.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the iconic character in 'Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles'?
Questions.Explanation: Leonardo is the disciplined and courageous leader of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles in the animated series.

Questions.Question: Which character is the iconic friend of Dora the Explorer?
Questions.Explanation: Boots is the adventurous and loyal monkey friend of Dora the Explorer in the animated series.

Questions.Question: Who is the iconic character in the cartoon 'Popeye the Sailor'?
Questions.Explanation: Popeye is the spinach-loving sailor and the main character in the 'Popeye the Sailor' cartoon series.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the iconic character in 'Rugrats'?
Questions.Explanation: Tommy Pickles is the adventurous and brave baby and the main character in the 'Rugrats' animated series.

Questions.Question: Which character is the iconic friend of Bugs Bunny?
Questions.Explanation: Daffy Duck is the zany and unpredictable friend of Bugs Bunny in various 'Looney Tunes' cartoons.

Questions.Question: Who is the iconic character in the cartoon 'The Pink Panther'?
Questions.Explanation: The Pink Panther is the suave and mischievous pink-colored panther and the main character in the cartoon series.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the iconic character in 'The Fairly OddParents'?
Questions.Explanation: Timmy Turner is the imaginative and adventurous boy and the main character in 'The Fairly OddParents' animated series.

Questions.Question: Which character is the iconic friend of Scooby-Doo?
Questions.Explanation: Shaggy is the laid-back and always hungry friend of Scooby-Doo in the 'Scooby-Doo' cartoon series.

Questions.Question: Who is the iconic character in the cartoon 'The Flintstones'?
Questions.Explanation: Wilma Flintstone is the strong-willed and resourceful wife of Fred Flintstone in 'The Flintstones' cartoon series.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the iconic character in 'The Smurfs'?
Questions.Explanation: Papa Smurf is the wise and caring leader of the Smurfs in the animated series.

Questions.Question: Which character is the iconic friend of Mickey Mouse?
Questions.Explanation: Goofy is the clumsy but good-hearted friend of Mickey Mouse in various Disney cartoons.
